doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Shahnewaz Chowdhury
doctor.specialty: Anesthesiology, Pain Management & Critical Care Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Shahnewaz Chowdhury is a Anesthesiologist in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, DA (DU), MCPS (Anesthesiology). He is a Consultant, Anesthesiology at Sylhet Womens Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Medical Center, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Shahnewaz Chowdhury at Popular Medical Center, Sylhet is 5pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
